Verses: 1 ippadippatta Vaakkuththaththangal Namakku Undaayirukkirapadiyinaal, Piriyamaanavargale, Maamsaththilum Aaviyilum Undaana Ellaa Asusiyum Neenga, Nammai Suththigariththukkondu, Parisuththamaakudhalai Devabayaththode Pooranappaduththakkadavom.
2 engalukku Idankodungal; Naangal Oruvanukkum Aniyaayanjeyyavillai, Oruvanaiyum Kedukkavillai, Oruvanaiyum Vanjikkavillai.
3 ungalaik Kutravaaligalaakkumporuttaaga Ippadi Naan Sollugiradhillai; Munne Naan Solliyapadi, Ungaludanekooda Saagavum Koodap Pizhaikkavunthakkadhaaga Engalirudhayangalil Neengal Irukkireergale.

4 migundha Thairiyaththode Ungaludan Pesugiren; Ungalaikkuriththu Migavum Menmaipaaraattugiren, Aarudhalaal Niraindhirukkiren, Engalukku Undaana Sagala Ubaththiravaththileyum Paripoorana Santhoshamaayirukkiren.

5 eppadiyendraal, Naangal Makkedhoniyaa Naattile Vandhapodhu, Engal Sareeraththirku Ilaippaarudhal Ondrumillaamal, Eppakkaththileyum Ubaththiravappattom; Purambe Poraattangalum, Ulle Bayangalum Irundhana.
6 aagilum, Sirumaippattavargalukku Aarudhal Seygira Dhevan Theeththu Vandhadhinaale Engalukku Aarudhalseydhaar.

7 avan Vandhadhinaalemaaththiramalla, Ungal Vaanjaiyaiyum, Ungal Thukkippaiyum, Ennaippatri Ungalukku Undaana Bakthivairaakkiyaththaiyum Avan Kandu, Ungalaal Adaindha Aarudhalaith Theriyappaduththinadhinaalum, Naanum Aarudhaladaindhu Adhigamaai Santhoshappatten.

8 aadhalaal Naan Nirubaththinaale Ungalaith Thukkappaduththiyirundhum, Andha Nirubam Konjappozhudhaagilum Ungalaith Thukkappaduththinadhendru Kandu Naan Manasthaabappattirundhum, Ippozhudhu Manasthaabappadugiradhillai.

9 ippozhudhu Santhoshappadugiren; Neengal Thukkappattadharkaaga Alla, Manandhirumpugiradharkedhuvaagath Thukkappattadharkaagave Santhoshappadugiren; Neengal Ondrilum Engalaal Nashtappadaadhapadikku, Dhevanukketra Thukkam Adaindheergale.
10 dhevanukketra Thukkam Pinbu Manasthaabappadugiradharku Idamillaamal Ratchippukkedhuvaana Mananthirumpudhalai Undaakkugiradhu; Lowgiga Thukkamo Maranaththai Undaakkugiradhu.

11 paarungal, Neengal Dhevanukketra Thukkamadaindhadhunde; Adhu Ungalidaththil Evvalavu Jaakkiradhaiyaiyum, Kutrandheera Evvalavu Niyaayancholludhalaiyum, Evvalavu Veruppaiyum, Evvalavu Bayaththaiyum, Evvalavu Aavalaiyum, Evvalavu Bakdhivairaakkiyaththaiyum, Evvalavu Kandippaiyum Undaakkitru. Indhak Kaariyaththile Neengal Ellaavidhaththilum Ungalai Suththavaangalendru Vilangappannineergal.

12 aadhalaal Naan Ungalukku Appadi Ezhudhiyirundhum, Aniyaayanjeydhavanimiththamumalla, Aniyaayanjeyyappattavanimiththamumalla, Dhevanukkumunpaaga Ungalaikkuriththu Engalukku Undaayirukkira Jaakkiradhai Ungalukku Velippadumporutte Appadi Ezhudhinen.

13 idhinimiththam Neengal Aarudhaladaindhadhinaale Naangalum Aarudhaladaindhom; Viseshamaagath Theeththuvinudaiya Aavi Ungal Anaivaraalum Aarudhaladaindhadhinaale, Avanukku Undaana Santhoshaththinaal Adhiga Santhoshappattom.

14 ippadiyirukka, Ungalukkup Pugazhchchiyaai Naan Avanudane Sonna Yaadhondraikkuriththum Vetkappadamaatten; Naangal Sagalaththaiyum Ungalukku Saththiyamaai Sonnadhupola, Theeththuvudane Naangal Ungalukkup Pugazhchchiyaai Sonnadhum Saththiyamaaga Vilangitre.
15 melum Neengalellaarum Kattalaikku Amaindhu, Bayaththodum Nadukkaththodum Thannai Etrukkondadhai Avan Ninaikkaiyil, Avanudaiya Ullam Ungalaippatri Adhiga Anbaayirukkiradhu.
16 aagaiyaal Ellaavidhaththilum Ungalaikkuriththu Enakkuth Thidanambikkai Undaayirukkiradhendru Santhoshappadugiren.
